viewData.name: Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10, HDR10+, HLG Support Motion Rate 240 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung NU8000
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung NU8000 82" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV. This TV has a 81.5" LED edge-lit LCD, and incorporates Motion Rate 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The NU8000 has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content-sharing and screen-mirroring with other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
